level.text: An optometrist who has met the requirements for licensure and has satisfied the requirement of completing thirty- six (36) hours of approved continuing education credit pursuant to 17 DCMR ยง 6406.4 is deemed competent to practice the profession of optometry.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 2157, 2158 (March 16, 2012).
